error.unable-to-verify: We were unable to verify your credentials. Please try again.
error.no-email: Email address is required for verification.
error.oauth-redirect: There was an error processing your social login

info-username.part5: You may use any value as the password.

info-email.part1: Enter your email address associated with your account.
info-email.part2: For testing, you can create a new account by clicking on the Sign Up link below.

email-verification.title: Email Verification
email-verification.message: We've sent a verification code to your email. Please enter it below to verify your account.
email-verification.code-resent: A new verification code has been sent to your email.
